author: YURI KAGEYAMA and STEPHEN WADE
title: Athletes Village for Olympics could house virus patients
description: The governor of Tokyo is talking about the possibility of using the under-construction Olympic Athletes Village as a temporary hospital for coronavirus patients
content:
TOKYO -- 
The under-construction Athletes Village for the Tokyo Olympics could be used as a temporary hospital for coronavirus patients.
Tokyo Governor Yuriko Koike has been talking about the possibility of occupying the massive development on Tokyo Bay, wh… [+2578 chars]
